name: Anti-Money Laundering (AML) Policy
description: Detects potential signs and symptoms of money laundering presented in conversation.  This policy matches based on word patterns.  This policy is provided for content classification purposes only.

name: Argentina Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data as defined by Argentina's Personal Data Protection Law No. 25,326 (PDPL), Argentina Bill No. MEN-2018-147-APN-PTE, and a general similarity to the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Argentina Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Argentina as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Attorney Client Privileged Policy
description: Detect documents which are protected by attorney-client confidentiality.

name: Australia Drivers License Number Policy
description: Detect Australia drivers license numbers.

name: Australia Individual Healthcare Identifier (IHI) Policy
description: Detect Australia Individual Healthcare Identifiers (IHI) and related content.

name: Australia Passport Policy
description: Detect Australia passport with related content.

name: Australia Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data or personal information as defined by Australia's Federal Privacy Act 1988 (Privacy Act), Privacy (Tax File Number) Rule 2015, Taxation Administration Act 1953, and cross-compatibility with European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Australia Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Australia as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Australia Tax Policy
description: Detect Australia tax file number and related content.

name: Austria Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data as defined by the Data Protection Act 2000 (DSG 2000), Regulation (EU) 611/2013 on the measures applicable to the notification of personal data breaches under Directive 2002/58/EC, European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive), and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Austria Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Austria as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Authentication Policy

name: Bank Account Number Policy

description: Detects Corona Virus Disease names and related terms.  This policy template can be extended with additional data elements to find content containing Coronavirus/COVID in specific contexts (for example, patient health, financial benefits, etc).

name: Workplace Harassment Policy
description: Detect content which may violate federal, state, local, corporate, and workplace or sexual harassment policies and regulations.  This policy helps detect content subject to corporate/workplace policy and legislative regulations such as Title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, California AB 1825 (Part of) "Fair Employment and Housing Act", Connecticut Public Act No. 19-16 "Time's Up Act", Delaware SB 360 (Part of) "Delaware Discrimination in Employment Act (DDEA)", Maine Revised Statutes Title 26, section 807 (Enhanced by) "Maine Human Rights Act", New York Assembly Bill A8421 AKA "Stop Sexual Harassment in NYC Act", and others.

name: Medical Diagnosis - Allergy Policy
description: Proposes possible Allergy medical condition or diagnosis based on medical signs and symptoms presented in a form or in conversation.  This policy matches based on English patterns and offers limit recommendation capabilities.  This policy is provided for content classification purposes only.  Patients should consult a qualified physician for all diagnosis and treatment.

This policy matches based on English patterns and offers limit recommendation capabilities.  This policy is provided for content classification purposes only.  Patients should consult a qualified physician for all diagnosis and treatment.

name: Medical Diagnosis - Prostate Cancer Policy
description: Proposes possible Prostate Cancer medical condition or diagnosis based on medical signs and symptoms presented in a form or in conversation.  This policy matches based on English patterns and offers limit recommendation capabilities.  This policy is provided for content classification purposes only.  Patients should consult a qualified physician for all diagnosis and treatment.

name: Medical Diagnosis - Sinus Infection Policy
description: Proposes possible Sinus Infection medical condition or diagnosis based on medical signs and symptoms presented in a form or in conversation.  This policy matches based on English patterns and offers limit recommendation capabilities.  This policy is provided for content classification purposes only.  Patients should consult a qualified physician for all diagnosis and treatment.

description: Proposes possible Female Sexually Transmitted Disease (STD) medical condition or diagnosis based on medical signs and symptoms presented in a form or in conversation.  This policy matches based on English patterns and offers limit recommendation capabilities.  This policy is provided for content classification purposes only.  Patients should consult a qualified physician for all diagnosis and treatment.

description: Proposes possible Male Sexually Transmitted Disease (STD) medical condition or diagnosis based on medical signs and symptoms presented in a form or in conversation.  This policy matches based on English patterns and offers limit recommendation capabilities.  This policy is provided for content classification purposes only.  Patients should consult a qualified physician for all diagnosis and treatment.

description: Proposes possible Stomach Ulcer medical condition or diagnosis based on medical signs and symptoms presented in a form or in conversation.  This policy matches based on English patterns and offers limit recommendation capabilities.  This policy is provided for content classification purposes only.  Patients should consult a qualified physician for all diagnosis and treatment.

name: Medical Diagnosis - Strep Throat Policy
description: Proposes possible Strep Throat medical condition or diagnosis based on medical signs and symptoms presented in a form or in conversation.  This policy matches based on English patterns and offers limit recommendation capabilities.  This policy is provided for content classification purposes only.  Patients should consult a qualified physician for all diagnosis and treatment.

name: Mexico Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data as defined by Mexico's Federal Law on the Protection of Personal Data held by Private Parties, Privacy Notice Guidelines (April 2013), Recommendations on Personal Data Security (November 2013), Parameters for Self-Regulation regarding personal data (May 2014), General Law for the Protection of Personal Data in Possession of Obligated Subjects, and a general similarity to the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Mexico Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Mexico as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Netherlands Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data applicable to Netherlands for Dutch Data Protection Act, European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive), and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Netherlands Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Netherlands as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Norway Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data applicable to Norway's Personal Data Act (PDA), European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive), and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Norway Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Norway as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Offensive Language Policy
description: Detect language containing curses, insults, racism, sexism, or other offensive content.

name: PCI-DSS Policy
description: Detects content subject to the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI-DSS) industry standard.

name: Peru Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data as defined by Peru Personal Data Protection Law - Law N° 29733, Political Constitution of Peru, and a general similarity to the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Peru Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Peru as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Poland Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data as defined by Poland's Personal Data Protection Act of August 1997 (PDPA), Telecommunications Act of July 2004, Telecommunications Act of July 2004, Insurance and Reinsurance Activity Act of September 2015, Act on Providing Services by Electronic Means of July 2002, Labour Code of June 1974, the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Poland Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Poland as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Portugal Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data as defined by the Data Protection Act (DPA) for Portuguese Law 67/98 (Data Protection Act), the Portuguese Constitution (Article 35 on the use of computerised data), Law 41/2004 implementing Directive 2002/58/EC on the protection of privacy in the electronic communications sector (E-Privacy Directive), Law 46/2012 implementing Directive 2002/22/EC on universal service and users' rights (Universal Service Directive), Regulation (EU) 611/2013 on the measures applicable to the notification of personal data breaches under Directive 2002/58/EC, European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive), and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Portugal Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Portugal as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Proposals / Bids Policy
description: Detects corporate proposal and bid documents.

name: Ransomware Policy
description: Detects ransom notes/demands/instructions from ransomware malware.

name: U.S. SEC Regulation Best Interest (RegBI) Policy
description: Detects potential signs and symptoms of communications to be reviewed for compliance with U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) Regulation Best Interest (RegBI) rule.  This policy matches based on word patterns.  This policy is provided for content classification purposes only.

name: Romania Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data as defined by Romania's Data Protection Law No. 677/2001 ("DPL"), Romanian E-Privacy Law No. 506/2004, E-Privacy Directive 2002/58/EC, Romanian E-commerce Law No. 365/2002, Electronic Commerce Directive 2000/31/EC, European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive), and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Romania Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Romania as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Russia Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data applicable to Russia Federal Law on Personal Data (No. 152-FZ), and Russian Code on Administrative Infractions (No.195-FZ).

name: Russia Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Russia as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Kingdom of Saudi Arabia Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data as defined by Kingdom of Saudi Arabia's Personal Data Protection Law (PDPL) (implemented by Royal Decree M/19 of 9/2/1443H (16 September 2021) ) and a general similarity to the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Kingdom of Saudi Arabia Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Kingdom of Saudi Arabia as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Singapore Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data as defined by Singapore's Personal Data Protection Act (PDPA), numerous laws relating to the processing of personal data in the public sector that apply to everyone, including secrecy and disclosure laws in the Official Secrets Act and the Electronic Transactions Act, and cross-compatibility with European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Singapore Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Singapore as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Slovakia Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data as defined by Slovakia's Act no. 122/2013 on Personal Data Protection, Act no. 84/2014 on Personal Data Protection, Law no. 136/2014 in Slovak Republic's  Collection of Laws, European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive), and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Slovakia Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Slovakia as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Slovenia Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data as defined by Slovenia's Personal Data Protection Act (“ZVOP-1” and “ZVOP-2”), Law no. 86/2004, Law no. 113/05, Law no. 51/07, Law no. 67/07, Law no. 94/07, European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive), and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Slovenia Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Slovenia as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: South Korea Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data as defined by South Korea's Personal Information Protection Act (Act No. 16930, Feb. 4, 2020), Enforcement Decree of the Personal Information Protection Act (Presidential Decree No. 30892, Aug. 04, 2020), Act on the Lapse of Criminal Sentences (Act No. 15258, Dec. 19, 2017, Partial Amendment), and a general similarity to the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: South Korea Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for South Korea as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: South Africa Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data applicable to South Africa Protection of Personal Information Act (POPIA / POPI).

name: South Africa Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for South Africa as defined by the South Africa Protection of Personal Information Act (POPIA / POPI), the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Spain Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data applicable to Spain's Data Protection Act (Law 15/1999 on the protection of personal data), European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive), and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Spain Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Spain as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Sweden Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data applicable to Sweden for Swedish Personal Data Act (PDA), European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive), and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Sweden Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Sweden as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: SWIFT Codes Policy
description: Detect Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunication (SWIFT) codes, also known as Bank Identifer Codes (BIC), also known as Business Identifier Codes (BIC), also known as ISO 9362, and related content.

name: Swiss Financial Market Supervision Act (FINMASA) Policy
description: Detects some data elements subject to the Federal Act on the Swiss Financial Market Supervisory Authority 956.1, Financial Market Supervision Act (FINMASA)

name: Switzerland National ID Policy
description: Detect Switzerland National Identifiers and related content.

name: Switzerland Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data as defined by Switzerland's Federal Act on Data Protection (FADP, DPA) and the Ordinance to the Federal Act on Data Protection (OFADP, OFDPA) at the Swiss federal and canton levels, Regulation (EU) 611/2013 on the measures applicable to the notification of personal data breaches under Directive 2002/58/EC, European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive), and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Switzerland Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Switzerland as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Taiwan Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data as defined by Taiwan Personal Data Protection Act, Enforcement Rules of the Personal Data Protection Act, and a general similarity to the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Taiwan Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Taiwan as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Thailand Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data as defined by Thailand's Personal Data Protection Act ("PDPA"), and a general similarity to the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Thailand Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Thailand as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Turkey Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data applicable to Turkey's Law on Protection of Personal Data No 6698 (Data Protection Law, KVKK), European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive), and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Turkey Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Turkey as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Ukraine Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data applicable to Ukraine "On Personal Data Protection" Law ("Data Protection Law") No. 2297 VI, No. 5491-VI, and No. 383-VII.

name: Ukraine Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Ukraine as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: United Arab Emirates (UAE) Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data as defined by United Arab Emirates (UAE) Article 379 of the UAE Penal Code, Cyber Crime Law (Federal Law 5 of 2012 regarding Information Technology Crime Control) (amended by Federal Law No. 12 of 2016 and Federal Decree Law No. 2 of 2018), and a general similarity to the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: United Arab Emirates (UAE) Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for United Arab Emirates (UAE) as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: U.K. Drivers License Number Policy
description: Detects U.K. drivers license numbers and related content.

name: U.K. National ID Policy
description: Detects U.K. National Identifiers and related content.

name: U.K. National Insurance Number (NINO) Policy
description: Detects U.K. National Insurance number and related content.

name: U.K. Passport Policy
description: Detects U.K. passports with related personal information.

name: U.K. Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data applicable to United Kingdom's Data Protection Act 1998 (DPA), European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive), and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: U.K. Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for United Kingdom as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: U.K. Unique Tax Reference (UTR) Policy
description: Detects U.K. Unique Tax Reference (UTR) number and related content.

name: United States California Assembly Bill 1298 (AB-1298) Policy
description: Detects electronic patient personally identifiable information (PII) for California's medical privacy law and medical identity theft to support California Assembly Bill 1298 (California/CA AB 1298).

name: United States California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) and California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA) Policy
description: Detects U.S.- and California-centric personally identifiable information in support of California AB-375, California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), and California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA).

name: United States California Confidentiality of Medical Information Act (CMIA) Policy
description: Detects individually identifiable medical information for United States California Confidentiality of Medical Information Act (CMIA), specified in California Civil Code §§56.

name: United States California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA) Sensitive Personal Information (SPI) Policy
description: Detects U.S.- and California-centric sensitive personal information (SPI) in support of U.S. California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA) of 2020.

name: United States California Financial Information Privacy Act (SB1) Policy
description: Detect personal financial information for California Financial Information Privacy Act, also known as CA SB1.

name: United States Colorado Privacy Act (CPA) Policy
description: Detects U.S.- and Colorado-centric personally identifiable information in support of Colorado Privacy Act (CPA).

name: United States Connecticut Data Privacy Act (CDPA) Policy
description: Detects U.S.- and Connecticut-centric personally identifiable information in support of Connecticut Data Privacy Act (CDPA).

name: United States Drivers License Number Policy
description: Detect United States drivers license numbers.

name: United States Export Controlled Information Policy
description: Detects content subject to export control under the U.S. International Traffic in Arms Regulations (ITAR), the Arms Export Control Act, the Export Administration Act, export controlled materials under U.S. Department of Commerce (DoC) Export Administration Regulations (EAR) 15 CFR §§730-774, the Export Administration Regulations (EAR), U.S. Executive Order 13556 "Controlled Unclassified Information" (CUI) 32 CFR Part 2002, or articles, services, and related technical data designated as defense articles or defense services pursuant to sections 38 and 47(7) of the Arms Export Control Act and constitute the U.S. Munitions List (USML).

name: Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA) Policy
description: Detect personal credit information for Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA).

name: United States Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA) Policy
description: Detects educational content subject to the U.S. Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA).

name: United States Federal Financial Institutions Examination Council (FFIEC) Policy
description: Detect personally identifiable and financial information for the U.S. Federal Financial Institutions Examination Council (FFIEC).

name: United States Financial Forms and Documents Policy
description: Detect United States financial forms and documents.

name: United States Federal Information Security Management Act (FISMA) Policy
description: Detect personal and security information and for U.S. Federal Information Security Management Act (FISMA) of 2002, also known as E-Government Act of 2002, also known as Public Law 107-347.  The type of information that should be protected depends on the relevant agency/sector.

name: United States Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act (GLBA) Policy
description: Detect personal financial information for the U.S. Financial Services Modernization Act of 1999, also known as Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act (GLBA), also known as Public Law 106-102.

name: United States Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) Policy
description: Detects electronic patient health information (ePHI) for U.S. Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA), also known as Public Law 104-191, and the Health Information Technology for Economic and Clinical Health (HITECH) Act.

name: United States Internal Revenue Service (IRS) 1075 Policy
description: Detect IRS tax forms and financial information for the U.S. Internal Revenue Service (IRS) 1075 and Internal Revenue Code (IRC) 6103.

name: United States International Traffic in Arms Regulations (ITAR) Policy
description: Detects content subject to export control under the U.S. International Traffic in Arms Regulations (ITAR), the Arms Export Control Act, the Export Administration Act, the Export Administration Regulations (EAR), or articles, services, and related technical data designated as defense articles or defense services pursuant to sections 38 and 47(7) of the Arms Export Control Act and constitute the U.S. Munitions List (USML).

name: United States Massachusetts Regulation 201 CMR 17.00 (MA 201 CMR 17) Policy
description: Detects U.S.- and Massachusetts-centric personally identifiable information in accordance with Massachusetts Regulation 201 CMR 17.00.

name: United States Medical Record Number Policy
description: Detect U.S. medical record numbers (generically).

name: United States New York State Department of Financial Services (NYDFS) Cybersecurity Regulation 23 NYCRR 500 Policy
description: Detects personal data applicable to the New York State Department of Financial Services (NYDFS) Cybersecurity Regulation, 23 NYCRR 500.

name: United States Passport Policy
description: Detects U.S. passports and passport cards with related personal information.

name: United States Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data applicable to United States's Federal and State laws, including The Federal Trade Commission Act (FTC Act), the Financial Services Modernization Act (Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act (GLB/GLBA)), the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA), the Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA), the Fair and Accurate Credit Transactions Act (FACTA), among many others.

name: United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) Forms Policy
description: Detect U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) Forms.

name: United States Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for the United States as defined by the California Consumer Privacy Act of 2018 (CCPA).

name: United States Sarbanes-Oxley (SOX) Policy
description: Detect forms and terms relating to the U.S. Sarbanes–Oxley Act of 2002 ("SOX", Public Law 107).

name: United States Social Security Number (SSN) and Taxpayer ID Policy
description: Detect United States taxpayer identification numbers.  This is typically the U.S. Social Security Number (SSN).

name: United States Utah Consumer Privacy Act (UCPA) Policy
description: Detects U.S.- and Utah-centric personally identifiable information in support of Utah Consumer Privacy Act (UCPA).

name: United States Virginia Consumer Data Protection Act (VCDPA) Policy
description: Detects U.S.- and Virginia-centric personally identifiable information in support of Virginia Consumer Data Protection Act (VCDPA).

name: Venezuela Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data as defined by Venezuela's Constitution of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela (1998), Venezuela's International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights (1978), Venezuela's Act for the Protection of the Privacy of Communications (1991), Venezuela's Act for the Protection of Girls, Boys and Adolescents (2000), and a general similarity to the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Venezuela Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Venezuela as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Vietnam Personal Data Policy
description: Detects personal data as defined by Vietnam's Draft Decree on Personal Data Protection in Vietnam dated February 9, 2021, the Constitution of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam 2013, Vietnam’s Civil Code 2015, Vietnam's Criminal Code No. 100/2015/QH13 (November 27, 2015), Vietnam's Criminal Procedure Code Law No. 101/2015/QH13 (November 27, 2015), Vietnam's Law on Protection of Consumers’ Rights No. 59/2010/QH12 (November 17, 2010), and a general similarity to the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Vietnam Sensitive Data Policy
description: Detects sensitive data for Vietnam as defined by the European Privacy Directive 95/46/EC on data protection (Data Protection Directive) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
